title: lucasjansen1980
author: lucasjansen1980
created_time: November 18, 2022, 12:10:36 AMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 11:01:35 AM by lucasjansen1980
content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin The Deja Vu testnet is the official testnet for the CORE MultiChain ecosystem, and gives developers and teams worldwide access to the Web3 technology of the future, with built-in privacy and interoperability!  Developers can easily migrate their dApps from major networks such as Binance Smart Chain, Tron, Harmony and Ethereum with minimal changes made to the source code of their applications. Anyone interested in testing the Deja Vu testnet can receive some test CMCX by sharing their wallet address on the official CORE MultiChain Telegram group. The official CORE MultiChain Telegram group: https://t.me/coremultichaingroup Deja Vu Testnet: https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin

comments.author: lucasjansen1980
comments.created_time: November 18, 2022, 12:19:30 AMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 11:02:03 AM by lucasjansen1980
comments.body: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin To add the CORE MultiChain?s Deja-Vu TestNet network to your wallets, please follow the below steps:==========================⭐️ For Metamask Wallet users:1. Go to the Explorer's website (https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/);2. Open the sidebar menu (top right of the page);3. Click on ?Add" button.*You can also enter the network configuration details manually to your Metamask wallet, using the following information:Network Name:CORE Multichain Deja vu TestNetNew RPC URL:https://testnet-rpc.coremultichain.net/Chain ID:2122Currency symbol:CMCXBlock explorer URL:https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/==========================⭐️ For CORE Wallet users:0. download the new version of CORE-MultiChain wallet: https://wallet.coremultichain.com1. In Home Page, click on the ?Add Token" button;2. scroll down and select ?CORE MultiChain Testnet? and click on ?Add Token?.==========================#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CMCX Coin #COREMULTICHAIN Project
